channel.title: Hyperion Framework Help
channel.description:
[b]NEVER MIND: RESOLVED[/b]
Hi guys, I'm trying to run the Hyperion framework from the rs2-framework home folder using this command:
[code] @echo off java -cp bin com.grahamedgecombe.rs2.Server pause [/code]
and I'm getting this error. As I'm not great with Java, I need some help resolving this error, can anyone help?
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/mina/core/ service/IoAcceptor Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.mina.core.service.IoAcceptor at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.grahamedgecombe.rs2.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Syrillia.

item.title: Hyperion Framework Help
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

NEVER MIND: RESOLVED

Hi guys, I’m trying to run the Hyperion framework from the rs2-framework home folder using this command:

@echo off
java -cp bin com.grahamedgecombe.rs2.Server
pause

and I’m getting this error. As I’m not great with Java, I need some help resolving this error, can anyone help?

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/mina/core/
service/IoAcceptor
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.apache.mina.core.service.IoAcceptor
        at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
        at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: com.grahamedgecombe.rs2.Server.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Syrillia.

Read full topic
